title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: At the north side of the house is a tumulus, termed the Moat Hill, said to have been composed of earth from the estates of the different proprietors who here attended on the kings.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The old steeple and pillory were built in the reign of Charles L The Moat Hill, the old runic cross, and the carved gateway in the palace parks, are relics of the Hamilton of old times, long since removed.
